name: angularjs-dev-wrapper
description: This starter project aims to wrap angularjs in an angular2+ development workflow and syntax.

scripts.start: npm run compile && npm run serve
scripts.compile: npm run pack-templates && npm run pack-stylesheets && npm run transpile:dev
scripts.build: npm run pack-templates && npm run pack-stylesheets && npm run transpile:prod

author: Ryan Conklin
